title: The Jake Bennett Adventures Vol. One: Jake Bennett: L.A.P.D. Rookie
description: Follow the adventures of Jake Bennett, a small-town boy who moves to Los Angeles in search of love and adventure. What he gets instead is political intrigue, lurid drag queen murders, and the anything-goes world of indie films! The JAKE BENNETT ADVENTURES tell the story of drugs, corruption and sexual gratification, and the toll it all takes on an honest man.
author: Bayla Dornon
